poem:
Title: "In the Halls of Power"

A bet laid down on sacred grounds,
Echoes greed in hallowed halls.
Silent whispers, clandestine sights,
Cloaked in power's gilded light. 
Deeds that lurk in corridors of thought,
Facebook gossips, Ladbrokes bought. 
For vanity of victories cheap,
The shepherd pawns his docile sheep. 
In the castle's hollow court,
Integrity becomes a sport.
